document_data.name: Sagecourse
document_data.mainbody: '''Sagecourse''' was a strong liquor consumed by travelers of [[wildspace]]. It was said to be an acquired taste.
document_data.Description: Sagecourse had a sharp, smokey taste that left a tingling sensation on the tongue.
document_data.History: The drink was distilled from an extract of [[Sagecourse (plant)|sagecourse]], a plant not found on the world of either [[Krynn]] or [[Toril]].
